初遇.encontent:
Hey, Jefe. Life is a gamble. Miracles won't happen
 if you just sit around and wait for it. When exactly
 are you going to make a bet?
初遇.content:
你好，老板～生活就是一场赌局。总是揣着手可不会发生
奇迹的哦，你打算什么时候才下注呢？

箱中气候.encontent: I bet you the weather's gonna clear up in three hours.
箱中气候.content: 我们来打个赌吧，我选天气会在三小时后放晴。

致未来.encontent:
The future–will the future bring more thrilling adventures? Think
 about it. Isn't it always like this in those exaggerated novels?
 Arcanum will eventually destroy the world and render everything
 to ruins!
致未来.content:
未来——未来会有更刺激的冒险吗？你想想，那些夸张的
小说里不都这样写吗？神秘术总归会毁灭世界，让一切都
变成废墟！

孑立.encontent: Slot machines, Blackjack, Russian Roulette ... Hah.
孑立.content: 老虎机、黑杰克、俄罗斯轮盘……哼哼～

问候.encontent: Oh, Jefe. Take a seat. Don't stand on ceremony.
问候.content: 哦，老板，随便坐，别和我客气。

朝晨.encontent:
Morning ... Huh?If my memory didn't fail me, I must
 have fallen asleep at the back of some truck last
 night ...
朝晨.content:
早上好……嗯？如果我没记错的话，昨晚我应该睡在了某
个卡车货仓……

信任-朝晨.encontent:
You're just in time. Shall we have breakfast together? I got
 some spicy burritos ... you don't like it?What about enchiladas?
 ... It's not about the type of food?
信任-朝晨.content:
来得正好，一起吃早餐吧？我准备了墨西哥辣酱卷饼……不
合胃口？那就墨西哥辣酱玉米片……不是种类的问题？

夜暮.encontent: It's night! It's night! Let the gamble begin!
夜暮.content: 夜晚！夜晚！开始吧，今天的豪赌！

信任-夜暮.encontent:
I was born holding this coin, but I have no idea where it came
 from ...  It's like a friend that's been accompanying me all
 these years, yet I don't even know its name.
信任-夜暮.content:
虽然我握着这枚金币出生，但始终搞不懂它的来历……就
像陪伴我多年的好友，我却连它的名字都不知道一样～

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Want some of my good luck? If you think it'll work,
 try me!
帽檐与发鬓.content: 想要沾上我的好运吗？如果你觉得这样有效的话，来吧——

袖与手.encontent: Here, let's shake hands! Buena chica!

衣着与身形.encontent:
If you want to be healthy, take care of what you eat. It doesn't
 feel good when you get an upset stomach. I once had a companion
 who would eat soil, screws and whatnot! Frightening, isn't it?
衣着与身形.content:
想要身体健康的话，最好留神吃进去的东西！闹肚子可不
好受。我曾经有一个合作伙伴，什么泥土啊、螺丝啊、都
能吃得下去！吓人吧？

嗜好.encontent:
Ooh, it's you, Jefe? Wanna go on an adventure? There
 are over 261.6 places that have been rated as dangerous.
 Murder scenes or cliffs, it's your call.
嗜好.content:
哦～这不是老板嘛～想一起去冒险吗？最近被评为危险的
场所有超过261.6个，无论是凶案现场还是悬崖峭壁
我们都有得选。

赞赏.encontent:
You'll definitely win a lot. Trust me, I'm never wrong.
 Every single slot machine in Las Vegas is like my
 babysitter. I know them!
赞赏.content:
你绝对能大赢一把的，相信我，我不会说错的。拉斯维加
斯每一架老虎机都是我的婴儿保姆，我懂它们！

亲昵.encontent:
Are you ready to do this with me? Everyone's jaws are
 going to drop and the ratings are going to soar like
 the eagles!
亲昵.content:
准备好跟我一起大干一场了吗？所有人都会惊掉下巴，收
视率将像雄鹰那样高飞～

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Wherever the coin goes, I go too ... It's always been
 this way.
闲谈Ⅰ.content: 硬币抛向哪儿，我就去到哪儿……一向如此。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
I'm often the object of people's jealousy because I'm
 too lucky, but as you know, with my luck, nobody can
 do anything to me.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
我总是因为太过好运而招人嫉妒，不过你也知道的，我运
气这么好，没人能对我怎么样～

独白.encontent:
Stability? Safety? For a life like that, you might as well just
 give me a poison apple and let me sleep! Remember to kiss me
 awake when there's something fun going on!
独白.content:
稳定？安全？如果要那样过日子，还不如现在就给我一颗
毒苹果，让我好好地睡上一觉！——等有了好玩的事儿，记
得吻醒我～

战前.encontent: Hey, give me a chip. Just one with the lowest denomination.
战前.content: 嗨，给我换点筹码。只要一枚，面额最低。

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Now, let me choose two lucky guests!
择选至终的仪式.content: 现在～由我来挑选两位幸运嘉宾！

释放神秘术Ⅰ.encontent: Hey, hey, hey! Don't be shy, mi amigo. Let's dance!
释放神秘术Ⅰ.content: 嘿、嘿、嘿！朋友，别这么拘谨，来跳舞吧——

释放神秘术Ⅱ.encontent: What? You still don't recognize me? What about now?
释放神秘术Ⅱ.content: 什么？你还不认识我吗？现在呢？

召唤至终的仪式.encontent:
Ladies and gentlemen, this is no magic nor any special
 kind of mechanism. Wish us ... luck!
召唤至终的仪式.content:
女士们，先生们，这不是魔术，也不是特殊机关。祝我们
——好运！

洞悉.encontent:
Heh, everyone's guessing who is this "Jefe" always
 supporting me,letting me stir up trouble on TV.  ...
 Wanna show up?
洞悉.content:
嘿，所有人都在猜呢，捧着我的“大老板”到底是谁，到
底是谁让我在电视屏幕上为非作歹。——你要去露个面吗
？

洞悉之底.encontent: Not enough oxygen. I feel like ... I'm about to fly!
洞悉之底.content: 氧气不足，就像是要飞起来了一样……！
